description: generates a self-signed certificate using SSH protocol with SSH key

cert_friendly_name.description: Human friendly certificate name (not CN but just a friendly name).

key_filename.description: Location of the filename that is used for the auth. Either I(key_filename) or I(password) is required.

rsa_nbits.description: Number of bits used by the RSA algorithm for the certificate generation.

cert_cn.description: Certificate CN (common name) embedded in the certificate signature.

password.description: Password credentials to use for auth. Either I(key_filename) or I(password) is required.

ip_address.description: IP address (or hostname) of PAN-OS device being configured.

signed_by.description: Undersigning authority (CA) that MUST already be presents on the device.
